sendAndReceive

public Message sendAndReceive(MessagingAddress dest,
                              Message msg)
                       throws java.io.IOException
インタフェース MessageSender の記述:
Send the given message, wait for a message and receive it.

定義:
インタフェース MessageSender 内の sendAndReceive
戻り値:
received message, or null in case of timeout.
例外:
java.io.IOException
